Question: On April 17, 2013, this person announced she recorded the song "Ooh La La" for the soundtrack of The Smurfs 2.
Hints: Later that October, "3" became this person's third single to reach number one on the Billboard Hot 100.
In December, this person became engaged to her long-time boyfriend Jason Trawick, who had formerly been her agent.
It reached number one in the US later in the month, giving this person her fifth number one on the chart.
